div.p: Apply to Philadelphia Performing Arts (Grades K-4)
Art-infused curriculum with a premium on both academic and performance excellence.
Say goodbye to the limitations of the textbook.

Growing the nextgeneration of
creative leaders.
Help us by showing your support with a donation today. Every bit helps!
Click Learn More to view positions available.
